name: Sam Stone
what_you_do: Samantha Stone is an author at The Bottom Line by Square, contributing insights and articles related to business management and growth.
who_you_serve: She serves small to medium-sized businesses looking to enhance their operations and customer engagement through Square's services.
bio: Supported by an award-winning team of writers and business experts, with a focus on empowering entrepreneurs for over a decade.
